metadata.description: Welcome to the BestFriend metaverseâ€”where dreams turn into realities. A collection of 6,500 unique BestFriend NFTs with a goal to bring light to depression and to make a meaningful impact on web2, web3, and beyond. Your BestFriend is your digital identity. Represent the brand and community, just like how your Bestfriend NFT will represent you.
